description: Elon Musk's Starlink was installed at the White House, raising significant national security concerns due to potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities and conflicts of interest.
notes: Installation bypassed standard White House communication security protocols. Congressional oversight initiated to investigate potential risks.

sources.title: Elon Musk's Starlink Terminal Installed on White House Roofâ€”Security Risks Flagged
House Oversight Democrats Demand Details on White House Starlink Installation
Elon Musk's Starlink internet service installed in White House

summary: In March 2025, SpaceX's DOGE team installed a Starlink satellite internet terminal at the White House, bypassing standard communication security protocols. Congressional Democrats raised significant national security concerns about potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities and conflicts of interest, highlighting the risks of uncontrolled internet access in sensitive government facilities.
title: Starlink Installed at White House, Raising Major Security Concerns
